beer.beer_description: Double Dragon has an ABV of 4.2%. It is a full drinking, premium Welsh Ale, which is malty and subtly hopped. Double Dragon has a rich colour and smooth balanced character. This deep copper red ale has a tangy red fruit flavour with nutty, toffee overtones.

user.bio:
Give me sci-fi/horror & Motörhead. Inebriologist and collector of badges.
Pics of new beers only.

items.checkin_comment: Delicious, unique flavor, some carbonation feel and then it disappears with super light aftertaste. I like it. Special delivery from Wales to brother in law
